Welcome to TinyCare! 

To start off, add a pet to TinyCare by clicking on the "+" button at the bottom of the page. 

This will bring you to a new page to enter the details of the hardware you purchased.
Enter your Hardware ID. \n\nThis ID should be given to you on the cover of your hardware packaging.

Basic details of your pet should appear after adding the corresponding correct Hardware ID. 

The default pet name and pet profile picture can be changed later in the Settings Tab of the pet. 

Click on your pet to access its TinyCare features and functions. 

To remove your pet from TinyCare, click on the delete button on the top right corner of the pet. Don't worry if you accidentally remove your pet, just add it again.
The bottom navigation bar allows movement between the primary functions in the app. \n\nIt is split into 3 tabs - Care, Photo and Settings (from left to right).
The Care tab allows automatic as well as manual topping-up of food and water.
The Care tab allows automatic as well as manual topping-up of food and water. \n\nIt also shows the cleanliness of the water in the fish tank, notifying the user when it is time to change the water.
The Care tab allows automatic as well as manual topping-up of water.
Automatic top-up of food and water can be enabled or disabled by simply toggling the switch-button on or off. \n\nAutomatic top-up will occur when the food/water level is low.
Automatic top-up of water can be enabled or disabled by simply toggling the switch-button on or off. \n\nAutomatic top-up will occur when the water level is low.

The food card displays information about the amount of food left and the previous top-up of food. \n\nThe \"TOP-UP FOOD!\" button at the top right corner also allows manual topping-up of food. The top-up does not take place if the food amount is full.

The food card displays information about the amount of food left and the previous top-up of food. \n\nThe \"TOP-UP FOOD!\" button at the top right corner also allows manual topping-up of food. The top-up does not take place if the fish is/are just fed recently.

The water card displays information about the amount of water left and the previous top-up of water. \n\nThe \"TOP-UP WATER!\" button at the top right corner also allows manual topping-up of water. The top-up does not take place if the water amount is full.

The water card displays information about the amount of water left and the previous top-up of water. \n\nThe \"TOP-UP WATER!\" button at the top right corner also allows manual topping-up of water. The top-up does not take place if the water amount is sufficient.

The water card displays information about the moisture level of the soil and the previous top-up of water. \n\nThe \"TOP-UP WATER!\" button at the top right corner also allows manual topping-up of water. The top-up does not take place if the soil is still sufficiently moist.

The cleanliness card displays information about the cleanliness of water in the fish tank. \n\nUnfortunately, there is no automatic or manual cleaning of water through the app (at the moment) and the user is required to manually replace the water himself/herself.

The Photo tab allows you to take a picture of your hamster at any point of time to see how it is doing. 

Simply do so through the round button with a camera icon. 

Unstable internet connection may cause the photo to take a longer time to load. If you see the loading progress circle, please be patient.

The Photo tab allows you to take a picture of your fish at any point of time to see how it is doing. 

Simply do so through the round button with a camera icon. 

Unstable internet connection may cause the photo to take a longer time to load. If you see the loading progress circle, please be patient.

The Photo tab allows you to take a picture of your plant at any point of time to see how it is doing. 

Simply do so through the round button with a camera icon. 

Unstable internet connection may cause the photo to take a longer time to load. If you see the loading progress circle, please be patient.
The Settings tab allows you to set your hamster\'s name and/or profile picture here. \n\nClick the green round button with a tick to confirm changes for both name and profile picture.
